tooltip.tutorialmod.magic_block.l1: This enigmatic block resonates with the atomic weave of our dimension.
tooltip.tutorialmod.magic_block.l2: It hides a tantalizing secret, yearning to be unlocked.
tooltip.tutorialmod.magic_block.l3: Decipher its nature for a touch of alchemy.
tooltip.tutorialmod.chisel.shift_down.l1: With a simple right-click, you can carve various types of stone into artistic bricks.
tooltip.tutorialmod.cauliflower.l1: A brain-shaped vegetable... But don't worry, zombies are not after this one!
